content: I'm trying setup gtk for rust. The document says to run this command pkg-config --modversion gtk4
Anywhere you want. Open a terminal and run it. It is just to check that gtk4 will be able to be found by the rust gtk4 wrapper. It doesn't have any sideffects.

I get this error when I run cargo build.

looks like glib version 2.0 is not installed on your system. Did you follow the instructions at https://www.gtk.org/docs/installations/ to install gtk4 and all of it's dependencies?
I thought the idea of having cargo is to auto install the dependencies.
Cargo does that only for Rust dependencies. You need to install GTK for your operating system. Instructions are here: https://www.gtk.org/docs/installations/
